name: Dance-Pop
description: Simple, yet catchy melodies and throbbing beats inspired initially by Disco and later various House styles.

children.name: Bubblegum Dance
children.description: Playful, childlike style with a Bubblegum-like atmosphere that often incorporates high-pitched, light-hearted, and usually female-fronted vocals.

children.name: Bubblegum Dance
children.description: Playful, childlike style with a Bubblegum-like atmosphere that often incorporates high-pitched, light-hearted, and usually female-fronted vocals.

children.name: Disco polo
children.description: Polish Dance-Pop, originally established from contemporary wedding / feast songs and Italo-Disco.

children.name: Disco polo
children.description: Polish Dance-Pop, originally established from contemporary wedding / feast songs and Italo-Disco.

children.name: Freestyle
children.description: Electro-influenced; developed in Latino communities in New York and Miami in the 1980s, especially dominated by Latin Freestyle and its Latin influences.

children.name: Freestyle
children.description: Electro-influenced; developed in Latino communities in New York and Miami in the 1980s, especially dominated by Latin Freestyle and its Latin influences.

children.name: Funk melody
children.description: Light and melodic take on Funk brasileiro, developed alongside Funk carioca.

children.name: Funk melody
children.description: Light and melodic take on Funk brasileiro, developed alongside Funk carioca.

children.name: Romanian Popcorn
children.description: Emerged in the second half of the 2000s in Romania, often featuring brass melodies and "staccato" pluck grooves.

children.name: Romanian Popcorn
children.description: Emerged in the second half of the 2000s in Romania, often featuring brass melodies and "staccato" pluck grooves.

children.name: Tecnorumba
children.description: Blend of the themes and singing style of Rumba flamenca with the most commercial forms of House, Techno, and Makina.

children.name: Tecnorumba
children.description: Blend of the themes and singing style of Rumba flamenca with the most commercial forms of House, Techno, and Makina.

children.name: Township Bubblegum
children.description: Synth-heavy Dance-Pop style popular in the South African townships in the 1980s and early 1990s.

children.name: Township Bubblegum
